title: Cool thing you can do on ekko
body:
Ok maybe someone has already said this

But next time you recall after shop, buy an item, wait a few seconds, then refund the item

Watch your health and mana as you do this

Almost as if you went back in time....

replies.body: Works best with Homeguard boots, but its a waste of an ult to be honest.
Bro, that happens to everyone all the time. What I don't know is if it can kill you...
